ðŸ“– Summary: OpenVoice is an instant voice cloning tool developed by MIT and MyShell. It allows users to clone voices accurately, control voice styles, and perform zero-shot cross-lingual voice cloning. The tool has been powering the voice cloning capability of myshell.ai and is now available for commercial use under the MIT license.
